Posts.EditableText: Due to changes in the way Photobucket does business, a link to an adventure doesn't work.  I have the link, but get a 502 error if I try it directly.  I have the game ID, is there any way I can get to the game without using the broken link?
Posts.HTML: Due to changes in the way Photobucket does business, a link to an adventure doesn't work. I have the link, but get a 502 error if I try it directly. I have the game ID, is there any way I can get to the game without using the broken link?
